name: True Crime: New York City
description:
True Crime: New York City is an action-shooter game developed by Luxoflux. It came out on 15-11-2005. It was published by Aspyr. On review aggregator Metacritic, True Crime: New York City has a score of 60. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play True Crime: New York City on GameCube, Xbox, PlayStation 2 and PC.
Brian Clarke produced the game. Sean Murray scored the game.
